entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to rain and ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
